title: "What is the Relationship Between Alchemy and Magic According to Historical Texts?"
first_phrase: This text delves into the intricate and mystical world of alchemy, and how the true meaning of the writings by alchemists like Geber should not be taken literally. The author cites various examples, including the relationship between alchemy and the world of heroes and magic, and the purification of a "metallic soul" leading to the resurrection of the body. The text also mentions the use of alchemical terminology in mystic and therapeutic systems. The relevance of this mysterious practice in modern times is explored, shedding light on its place in the history of science.
